Open Source

Open source projects I created and maintain.

Follow @luhuanju

  • Online Blog System — A Python Django app with AngularJS and Docker for an onlint Blog System
  • Pathfinding Visualizer — Independently built an Open-source responsive web application that visualizes the shortest and optimal path between two locations, and demonstrates the process of classical pathfinding algorithms in an intuitive manner.

  • RipplesSpreadView —A custom View for Android app

Apps

Pathfinding Visualizer

In 2022 I created Pathfinding Visualizer, an web app to visualizes the shortest and optimal path between two locations and demonstrates the process of classical pathfinding algorithms in an intuitive manner. It is hosted on AWS using services like, S3, Cloudfront, API Gateway, and more. The tech stack is using JavaScipt, React.js, HTML/CSS

About Me

My name is Huanju. I'm a software developer specializing in Java, Python and AWS. I have a website that I developed independently using React and JavaScript. I like new technologies and have experience in solving problems in real-world scenarios.
